# Table View

![Table View](https://dev.maurice-conrad.eu/img/photon/table1.png)

```html
<table class="table-striped">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>Kind</th>
      <th>File Size</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>photon.css</td>
      <td>CSS</td>
      <td>28K</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>photon.css</td>
      <td>CSS</td>
      <td>28K</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>photon.css</td>
      <td>CSS</td>
      <td>28K</td>
    </tr>
    ...
    <tr>
      <td>photon.css</td>
      <td>CSS</td>
      <td>28K</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
```
